Address: 132 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Cosy Weekend Retreat and so affordable !
There is a special feel here with this delightful 3 bedroom timber cottage. Light and bright throughout, the kitchen combines with meals, separate lounge room and three generous bedrooms, two with BIR'S, central bathroom, and laundry. Features include gas log heater, split system air conditioner, polished timber floors, period features, washing machine, new fences and plenty of storage. The rear decking provides for outdoor entertaining. Off road parking for 2 vehicles and room to add carport STCA. Land size 442m2. A low maintenance getaway to enjoy the bay and wineries.

Description:
BE SURPRISED BEHIND THE LEAFY FACADE!
Interesting and appealing architecture, built to take advantage of the tree lined reserve, set on APP., 790 SQM of land. A generous entrance opens to the large formal lounge with separate dining, a peaceful and quiet outlook, second living has excellent kitchen with space for meals and/or living. The hallway flows to extra generous master bedroom with ensuite and WIR, remaining two have BIR'S, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Downstairs rumpus room or den provides another living (maybe home office, has direct internal access as well). Features woodfire box, timber beamed ceilings, granite benches, walk in pantry, split system, fans and more. Double garage, wide front verandah, garden shed and easterly back deck. Inspect and appreciate all that is here, middle of the village but... a bush haven.

Description:
A SHORT STROLL TO THE WATERFRONT!
Situated a mere 180 meter walk to the stunning Clifton Springs coastline with pristine swimming beaches is this fantastic home featuring 3 generous bedrooms including a Master with WIR, 2 living areas and a functional kitchen with gas cooking. This lovely home has a practical floorplan that enjoys northerly facing sun drenched formal lounge with bay window & access to the rear garden from the open plan dining/living area, making the most of an indoor/ outdoor lifestyle. Perfect for those looking to secure a part of the Bellarine Peninsula for their lifestyle, investment portfolio or holiday home with access to beaches, golf course, walking tracks and more at your doorstep.

Description:
Low Maintenance Living in Ideal Locale
Boasting an elevated corner position in the prized location - this classic brick veneer family home is the ideal alternative to a townhouse; offering a compact allotment but benefiting from a lot more living space plus scope to update and modernise the interior if desired.
The well-presented interior, features an entrance foyer leading to a generous sitting and dining room and three zoned bedrooms two with BIRs and master with WIR and is all serviced by a central family bathroom and sperate toilet. a stunning blackwood central kitchen with gas cook top, electric oven and ample bench space is the heart of this home.
Other features include large laundry, gas log heating, easy care gardens, wrap around verandah with views and remote double garage with secure internal entry, 2.8m high roller doors and side access for the boat or caravan.
This excellent property is situated in a quiet and well-established pocket of Leopold, within walking distance to public transport, Leopold Sportsmans Club, the local convenience store and just a short drive to Leopolds Gateway Plaza .

Description:
Top Shelf!
It is very apt that this fine residence sits proudly on one of Clifton Springs most elevated sites as it is 'top shelf' in every sense of the word. Originally a custom build of the highest calibre it has now been remastered to become the ultimate Bellarine Peninsula 'lifestyle' home.
The enviable land holding of approximately 1282m2 boasts picturesque garden settings (automated watering systems), established plantations flank the boundaries to create privacy and seclusion (bay views through the tree tops) and a grand exposed aggregate circular driveway (dual cross over) with side/rear access delivers 'one of a kind' user friendly features to accommodate the cars, boats, caravans or even the jet ski!
A beautifully appointed 3 bedroom residence with high quality fixtures and fittings throughout
The master suite is complete with en-suite and generous built in robes. The second and third bedrooms form a guest wing and are serviced by a second bathroom (complete with spa bath)
A timber kitchen is simply charming and serves up a practical space; expansive bench tops, excellent storage solutions and quality fixtures
A stunning formal lounge of grand proportions boasts a northerly aspect; dual bay windows promote wonderful natural light and prime outlook over established gardens
The second living area is expansive; glass sliding door step out onto a decked entertaining space; a lovely place to take in an early coffee whilst bathed in sunshine
This home is fully equipped for those who love to entertain; a purpose built and sheltered area to the rear of the residence
The oversized garage spans 8.8m x 7.8m approx and serves up a myriad of options but just wait there is more; under-house storage as far as the eye can see gives further scope and options if you desire
Warm, welcoming and charming this property will instantly give you the 'I am home feel'; all the modern comforts and an impressive inclusions list to be discovered upon further inspection

Description:
Offering the Aussie dream on 1,812m2 (approx.).
It's not often that you come across an opportunity like this. On offer is 1,812m2 (approx.) of private land accompanied by an exquisite forever home that's ready to enjoy or start renovating to your heart's content.
Comprising of four well-sized bedrooms, three with walk-in robes, one with built-in robes & master with its own spacious ensuite, an open plan kitchen overlooking the dining area, central bathroom with separate toilet, a combined dining & lounge zone & expansive laundry. The bountiful yard space will have any handy man, growing family, green thumb or "fur baby" in awe. Exterior to the home, you're offered a double garage and plenty of space to cater for all of your friends & family.
You're located less than a 15min drive to the Geelong CBD, surrounded by schools for all ages & public transport, shops & leisure facilities are all nearby. Considering what is on offer, we're yet to flaw this location.
For any questions or queries, please don't hesitate to contact us anytime.

Description:
Your Next Chapter Awaits
An intelligent design, conveniently located and a rare chance to own. This property has been immaculately maintained and offers comfortable living for the first home buyer, young family or an opportunity to secure the ideal investment property. The instant comfort and appeal of this home, complimented by its outstanding central location, will ensure this residence is a talking point amongst buyers.
Offering a cleverly designed floorplan to maximize space and functionality. Comprising three generous size bedrooms, main bedroom with walk in robe and private ensuite. A central bathroom services the remaining bedrooms including shower, bath, vanity and separate toilet. The open plan kitchen, dining and living zone is bathed in natural sunlight. The kitchen boasts wrap around bench tops, gas cook top, stainless steel electric oven, dishwasher and built in storage. Completing the floorplan inside is a second separate living area, as well as the sizeable laundry offering storage and easy access to the backyard.
Step outside to the undercover outdoor entertaining area, ideal for family gatherings and entertaining which adjoins a spacious yard featuring beautiful gardens, an abundance of space for kids and pets to enjoy. The large established gum tree, a rare finding in homes these days, providing shade to the yard. A double undercover carport and space for side gate access to the rear of the property services the home.
Added extras include 2xsplit system, gas heater and gas wall furnace provide heating and cooling for year-round comfort, solar panels, ceiling fans and a garden shed for extra storage.
Situated in a central location, a position which is second to none. Within close proximity to Leopold Primary school, walking tracks, parks and bike trails. Public transport only a stones throw away and moments from some of the best beaches the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer. Whether you are going to live in, renovate or invest, don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity!

Description:
An impressive modern home that ticks all the boxes!
This impressive 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 2 living zones plus study nook property has everything you need and more. Sitting on a generous 560m2 block this Simonds home is conveniently situated in one of Leopold's most desired and family friendly locales.
The master suite, located at the front of the home, creates a sense of luxury, with a fully equipped ensuite as well as a generous walk in robe. The remaining three bedrooms provide ample accommodation, all consisting of large built in robes and serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet.
A classic designed kitchen features, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, plenty of bench space and a large pantry. The free flowing kitchen/meals/family area provides open plan living making this the social core of the home, perfect for family gatherings or all of your entertaining needs.
Glass sliding doors delivers a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor living. Step out to the low maintenance gardens and your private and secure & BBQ area. Ample off-street parking is provided with a double remote lock up garage with internal access with the added bonus of side access to park your boat/trailer or extra car.
All year comfort is accounted for with evaporative cooling and ducted heating.
This quality home represents an outstanding lifestyle choice in Leopold, one of Geelong's high growth suburbs. Located within close proximity to the Gateway Plaza, Geelong CBD, Bellarine Peninsula, local primary school & public transport. This home would appeal to those looking for space and privacy while still having the luxury of all amenities close by.

Description:
SPACE FOR FAMILY, ROOM FOR TRADIE TRUCKS
Larger blocks are hard to find in our area. Looking for space around you? Then this home might be what you are looking for. Spacious family home. Home backs onto the Clifton Springs Primary School. Can't get any closer for the kids. Room for the Tradie trucks or the boys toys. Only a stoneâs throw down the road to the boat ramp if you like fishing or a walk along the water's edge overlooking Corio Bay to the You Yangs. In an established area of Clifton Springs it is close to all the amenities for work, rest and play. Enjoy eating out? Cafe's, restaurants, pubs you are spoilt for choice. Exercising is also taken care of with walking tracks, sporting organisations, dance groups and gyms again you will be spoilt for choice. Statistics state that people choose to live in areas where they can get to everything they need within a twenty minute radius. This suburb ticks a lot of boxes. Floor-plan layout allows for zoned living, separate living areas front and rear. Conversations can flow freely in the kitchen while sitting at the bench and overlooking the family area. There is a large undercover entertainment area. Many a BBQ could be held here with family and friends.

Description:
Outstanding Family Home
A stunning family home with open plan living, gorgeous natural light, sensational privacy and great outdoor areas. This 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom single level residence on 673sq m (approx) is a peaceful and well-appointed Leopold retreat that youll absolutely fall in love with.
The north-facing alfresco area makes for a brilliant first impression. A well maintained, landscaped rear garden makes a perfect backdrop, whether you are playing with the kids or pets on the lush grass area or entertaining family and friends in the spacious undercover alfresco zone.
Step inside the actual home and you will feel an immediate sense of welcome and warmth with quality floor tiles and carpets throughout. The clever floor plan allows for open, yet dedicated areas, which include the central family & meals area with a high raked ceiling. The modern updated kitchen features a dishwasher, electric oven, gas stove top and plenty of storage. Three bright generous bedrooms includes the master suite, which boasts a walk-in-robe and private ensuite. The other bedrooms, complete with built-in robes, are serviced by the main central family bathroom.
Other features include gas wall heater and split system cooling & heating to the main living/meals area, double remote garage, NBN internet available, outdoor water tank storage and shedding in the rear yard.
This home represents outstanding value in a hot Leopold property market. Close to all amenities including Leopold Primary School, Gateway Plaza Shopping complex, public transport, medical facilities and 10 minutes from some of the Bellarines finest beaches and attractions. This is sure to be snapped up quickly, dont miss your chance and enquire today!

Description:
Family Delight- Ideal Location for an Ideal Lifestyle
Positioned in a quiet, and convenient location within walking distance to Dorothy Street shops, Allanvale Pre School, public transport and health services.
This immaculate family home provides exceptional family living in a brilliant location. Set amongst delightful gardens and occupying a generous 664m2 (approx.) allotment. This beautiful residence is ready and waiting for a new family to call it home.
Towards the front of the home find the roomy family living area with brick feature wall, air conditioner, large windows and open fireplace making it the coziest room in the house. Timber kitchen with electric oven, cooktop and a breakfast bar; serving a large casual dining area where you can enjoy your coffee while watching the birds play in the beautiful side gardens.
The master bedroom offers plenty of robe space, built in shelves and cupboards and small private ensuite. While the remaining three bedrooms (or study) are all of a generous size, and two offering built in robe and utilize the pristine central bathroom.
Outdoors is sure to impress with beautifully decorated gardens, undercover entertaining area and plenty of storage space. Added extras include ceiling fans, gas wall heater furnace, large double carport- perfect for storage of a caravan or boat, garden sheds and powered work shop.
This magnificent family home makes you want to kick off your shoes and unwind, ideally positioned for living convenience. An inspection is truly a must!

Description:
Unique opportunity to create your own haven in the Barrabool Hills.
Stunning undulating countryside provides spectacular views youll never tire of at this rare slice of the highly sought Barrabool Hills.
First time offered, the 2013sqm property was originally part of the Strathlachlan Estate and held by the one family since 1851. It presents a unique opportunity to create a tranquil, private haven with a manageable land size just 10 minutes from Highton Village and the Princes Highway Ring Road.
The builders own home was built to last in 1967 and displays plenty of mid-century charm to update, renovate or redevelop, and add your own modern stamp to the original brick dwelling that includes features such as a timber panelled entry and painted brick feature wall in the lounge room. There are timber floors waiting to be uncovered beneath the carpet and ample space to renovate the central kitchen with a new electric wall oven and cooktop, walk-in pantry and large servery window onto the living room. Deep windows and sliding doors link the lounge and two front bedrooms to a terrace and frame lovely views of the surrounding hills, with no neighbours in sight.
The vista over Mt Moriac is a highlight of the kitchen and dining area at the rear. All three bedrooms in the main house have large built-in wardrobes and share an updated bathroom and separate toilet. A second self-contained dwelling provides a fourth bedroom and study or potential fifth bedroom. With its own entry, kitchen and bathroom, it would be ideal for a teenager, ageing parent or even Airbnb. Outside a double garage with through access and separate single garage and large workshop are perfect for those who like to tinker.
The property is nine minutes from Moriac, 20 minutes from the Geelong CBD and surf coast beaches, 30 minutes from the Avalon Airport and 70 minutes from Melbourne. Commuters can travel from the front gate to the West Gate Bridge without encountering a traffic light.

Description:
Delightful Deck Entertainer
Drive through double gates to neat gardens & plenty of exposed aggregate to park the family cars or boat or even caravan. This 3 bedroom plus study home will tick some boxes for sure. Open plan tiled living is the family hub including the kitchen with a stainless steel electric hot plate, range hood & oven. Step down to another larger living with timber like floors with a reverse cycle split-system & sliding doors out to the deck. Off to the side is the study with built in desks & shelving. Down the hall you will find 3 bedrooms all with built in robes. Central bathroom has a separate shower & small bath just right for kids. Laundry has plenty of cupboards for storage. Massive undercover deck will impress you & is the perfect entertainment zone for any function. Back yard has low maintenance gardens & a single car garage perfect for a man cave or storage shed. Plus, rear access gates you can drive into from the reserve. Additional features are privacy blinds, stylish light fittings, ceilings fans throughout plus solar panels all on a 585m2 block & just a few minutes' drive to the Clifton Springs boat ramp, the bay & stunning cliff top walks. Also close to local shops, schools, medical facilities & public transport. A must on your shopping list.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Address: 86-88 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Brilliant Bellarine Beauty
There is something a bit special about this extensive home located just moments to the waters edge. The substantial 1,207m² (approx) allotment brings a myriad of opportunities and the expansive bay views are mesmerising.
Beautifully presented and offered over three levels, upstairs features include two separate living zones and a spacious master suite with walk-in robe and en-suite. Sun filled with sea views, the lounge area will be a favourite room to spend time relaxing and taking in the vista. There is effortless connection to outdoor entertaining on a large deck with a northerly aspect. The open plan living zone is the hub of the home and it includes a generous contemporary kitchen and adjacent meals and living area.
Downstairs offers the perfect childrens retreat or accommodation for guests. Highlights here include a light filled rumpus room; three bedrooms with built-in robes; a study; family sized bathroom; two separate powder rooms; a large laundry; and plentiful storage including a purpose built storeroom.
One of the most outstanding features of this property is the vastness of its site. The double block has been lovingly landscaped and feels like a private haven. Mature trees and established easy care gardens envelope the residence. You may choose to enjoy its spaciousness just as it is, extend the footprint, or alternatively investigate a possible subdivision (STCA).
You will love the close proximity of beaches, boat ramp, reserves, private and public schools and the golf course. Geelong is a short commute away and the bounty of the Bellarine is right on the doorstep, as well as the daily ferry from Portarlington to Melbourne! Enjoy lifestyle plus location with this stylish forever home.

Description:
LAST ONE REMAINING
Central Drysdale location in an intimate residential estate. All amenities are just a short walking distance from your future home. The best of a coastal lifestyle and a semi rural, close knit community with every convenience at your doorstep. This is the last titled block available.
The peninsula location is renowned for the idyllic, outdoor lifestyle. Central to bay side beaches, local wineries, great schools and great fishing spots.The Port Phillip Ferry sails daily from Portarlington and South Bank if you fancy a day trip to the city. You will ask yourself why you didn't make the move sooner.

Description:
Country lifestyle, town convenience
Meander up the winding tree-lined gravel driveway to the grand residence set on almost 6 acres and begin to relax in the peaceful surrounds. Open the remote controlled double iron gates to the main residence with welcoming water feature or wander up the private track to the guest cottage.
The house boasts an enormous open living room, currently being used as three dining & casual living areas. The main living area is warmed by a slow combustion fireplace and ducted heating, also throughout the whole house.
The modern kitchen has new stainless steel appliances, plenty of cupboards & bench space, overlooking the open plan living area.
The south wing contains three bedrooms & two bathrooms.
A study off the main entry with built in desks & book cases could be an extra bedroom with its own built in robes.
The spacious master bedroom with modern ensuite & walk in robe overlooks the grounds.
The separate dining area opens out to the "Observatory", just one of many outdoor entertaining areas.
The timber gazebo outdoor fire pit is just a small part of creating a fantastic outdoor lifestyle.
A working organic hobby farm with productive orchard & watering system throughout.
The work the owners have put into this property is outstanding, with landscaped gardens adorning the residence.
A fully renovated separate COTTAGE with its own power meter, is ideally suited for co-generational living or an AirBnB business. A quaint verandah, large living space, two bedrooms, bathroom, modern fitout this is a stylish addition away from the main house.
The layout of the property lends itself to numerous pursuits; from 4 paddocks for the pony(s), alpacas, sheep & goats each with their own water supply. Over the road was a successful bulb farm due to the light loamy, easy to dig soil.
There are a multitude of sheds; from paddock shelters, wood, hothouse, nursery, aviaries, gym, utilities, tractor, car & boat. The list seems endless.
The large rumpus room is ideal as a mancave, all you need is to bring your memorabilia.
The large machinery shed is ideally suit for those with earthmoving equipment or a big boat.
Plenty of tanks for water (43 thousand litres of water) with the backup of mains water.
6.5 Kw solar system to reduce your environment impact.
With plenty of hardstanding there is no shortage of parking.
The boundaries are lined with maturing trees offering a privacy from the main road & neighbours.
The property is a very short distance from the prestigious St Ignatius College, Bellarine Secondary & St Thomas'.
This is location living; offering country lifestyle with town convenience; Drysdale Bypass access; walk to schools, town centre, Lake Lorne; short drive to Coles, Aldi, Safeway, Bunnings & Kmart.

Description:
Paramount Views Of The Bay And Beyond!
Boasting an impressive elevated position and featuring unsurpassed views of the bay and beyond, 47 Dandarriga Drive encapsulates all the highly sought after "must have" qualities that Clifton Springs is renowned for.
Framed by the beautifully landscaped front garden, the discerning buyer can easily visualise how much potential there is for the ability to park their boat, caravan and cars off street which is a quality that doesn't become available often.
Upon entering the home, you are immediately distracted by the views that the family room features. From the family room, the spacious kitchen is the central hub of the home featuring expansive benchtops and more than generous cupboard and storage options and featuring beautiful timber flooring throughout the family, kitchen and dining room.
An informal dining room will definitely be a talking point as it also features stunning views and leads out to a prominent balcony alfresco area that will be the envy of family and friends. Featuring 3 bedrooms with the master having an ensuite and WIR there is also the option of a ground level fourth bedroom which is currently a storage room. There is also a ground level rumpus room/workshop area leading to a two car garage.
47 Dandarriga Drive will instantly appeal and is underpinned by its highly sought after lifestyle credentials, with the vast array of award winning restaurants and wineries close by, all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for multiple shopping and schooling precincts close by and access to public transport seconds from your front door.
This beautiful home is a definite "must inspect" property to add to your list.

Description:
Meticulous renovation on 650m2 (approx.).
Renovated to a meticulous standard, this home upon 650m2 (approx.) extends many positives to any first-home buyer, investor & all buyers alike.
Upon entry, you're greeted by the beautifully polished floorboards, taking you to the renovated, open kitchen & dining area with 40mm stone benchtops, dishwasher & stainless steel oven & stove, the living area, blending some unique character & bounds of natural light, the three bedrooms with robes, central bathroom & laundry with access to the second toilet, all serviced by ducted heating.
Overlooked from the dining areas full length sliding doors is the tranquil rear yard with its own alfresco area, plenty of shedding & multi-car garages with additional space for entertaining or a workshop. The front yard conveniences you with an abundance of off-street parking.
You're located nearby to many major amenities including Leopold Primary School, Gateway Plaza, Ash Road shops, parks & reserves & easily accessible to the Geelong CBD & Bellarine Peninsula.
